sections.text: analysis examiner, defined.Voice analysis examiner shall mean any person, other than an intern, who uses an instrument capable of permanently recording on a graph one or more psychophysiological reactions present in the voice of an examinee for the purpose of attempting to determine truth or deception.SourceLaws 1980, LB 485, ยง 10.

81-1910.Voice analysis examiner, defined.

Voice analysis examiner shall mean any person, other than an intern, who uses an instrument capable of permanently recording on a graph one or more psychophysiological reactions present in the voice of an examinee for the purpose of attempting to determine truth or deception.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 485, ยง 10.
